Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28863 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28863 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs18 is earlier than 18.20.3-1, affected by CVE-2024-28863
